title: LED Lighted Adjustable Power Zoom Vanity Mirror 1X to 5X  - MODEL: PZV01
description:
Conveniently classy. 

Zadro's Power Zoom LED Lighted Mirror is the all-in-one vanity mirror. The optical quality glass ensures a clearer reflection of your true self, while the patented hydrophobic coating repels water to keep it completely fog-free no matter how steamy the environment. 

Easily control the six tilt positions, bright LED lights, and motorized adjustable magnification, all at the touch of a button. The 1X magnification is great for your all-around viewing needs while the 5X magnification is perfect for getting up close and personal. 

No matter how dim the environment, the powerfully bright, LED bulbs are sure to evenly illuminate your face. And because of the energy-saving LED technology, it uses 70% less electricity than regular bulbs. 

Available in a pure white finish.  

Features:

• Adjustable Magnification Allows you to Customize the Magnification to your Preference
• Power Zoom Technology Adjusts the Magnification at the Push of a Button
• 3 LED Lights Positioned Around the Mirror for Lighted Viewing
• Functions as a Handheld or Vanity Mirror
• Optional 4.5V AC Adaptor or 3 AAA Batteries (Not included)

transcripts:
[MUSIC PLAYING]

Classic and Unique. This is the Power Zoom vanity mirror. To illuminate the mirror, simply press the ON/ OFF button on the base. The power zoom vanity mirror has six viewing positions that can easily be adjusted with tilt control, allowing you to customize your viewing angle. Additionally, the magnification can be customized to you liking with patented, power zoom technology. The push button Power Zoom feature will adjust the magnification to one times to five times. Perfect for your daily beauty routine or even those close up details. If you prefer to hold the mirror for close up viewing, the ergonomic design allows for handheld ease. This mirror is also conveniently wall mountable. There's a mounting bracket located on the back of the unit and suctions cups are included for easy installation. Instructions are also included. The compact size makes this the perfect travel mirror as it folds down to be almost entirely flat. The Zadro Power Zoom vanity mirror features a six inch brown mirror with bright LEDs to give you the perfect illuminated fog free view.
